title: Arcade Rengar
body:
Next year for the Arcade skins we could have a few other champions, but Arcade Rengar sounds like a good idea because he hasn't had a skin since the SSW win in 2014 which came out like a year and a half ago.

Whenever he jumps he could have a Mario pixelated jump sound, his effects could be thematically similar to Riven's skin, you could change the physical aspect of his E to a pixel energy blast, maybe even give him a new voice over and make it 1820.

replies.body: We need an alien vs predator theme for rengar and kha its such a good resemblance idk why Riot haven't considered it yet

I gave you this answer a little while ago:

> Headhunter Rengar is the predator theme, so from that perspective they already sorta have. Rek'Sai is sorta an Alien/Predator hybrid as well. The themes are definitely there, but they likely have to be very careful so as not to infringe on anything that would get them in trouble :P

tl;dr though, it's not that it hasn't been considered, but rather a matter of copyright and IPs
The title alone sounded like a mediocre idea but the way you described it sounds really cool :P
Nah we need battle bunny rengar first.

i dont think rito would do this but the only acceptable way  to do arcade rengar is when he ults he gets a nyan cat rainbow behind him and the song starts playing maybe rito could make a league themes song for it
Tell that to Illaoi She hasn't a skin since she came out. She has one skin.

She was released pretty much this year a few days before 2016 and Rengar got his last skin the start of 2015 pretty much so even though new skins could be made for Illaoi I'm just representing what could be good as an Arcade since they make those every year now same with Pool Party.
